item.title: Finally! Logitech C922
item.author: Author
item.description: Yoo! I finally got the C922 PRO HD Webcam from Logitech after wishing having it for years. Honestly, I bought the camera in a slightly higher price due to the model being out of stock in major stores and just got from a “hoarder” in Facebook marketplace. :) Harsh but true. Let’s get into my short blog/review/impression about this industry-standard in semi-professional streaming. Wait You might ask, why only now?

item.title: Logitech G304 Review
item.author: Author
item.description: So this is my short and honest review of the G304 wireless mouse. As I mentioned on my previous blog post here, this is my 4th mouse and my first gaming? wireless mouse. I ordered it online from DataBlitz for $39, and was delivered quickly in 2 days. What’s in the box? The box contains the wireless mouse itself, the usual manuals, Logitech Gaming promo leaflet, a blue G logo sticker, a Duracell AA battery, and a USB extension cord.
